thrasthawadaya merata thula sampurnayen kriyathmaka wima walakwimen pasuwa koti dayasporawa samanga ekwa nawatha warak rata thula thrasthawadaya prathisanwidhanaya kirima sandaha katayuthu karana thrasthawadi sanwidhayakayan 40 denek athadanguwata ganima sandaha merata polisiya jathyanthara polisiya haraha rathu niwedana nikuth kara thibe.koti dayasporawa samanga jathyanthara koti jalayata ekwi nawatha warak merata thula koti sanwidhanaya kirima sandaha mowun meratata mudal aadiya ewamin wides ratawala sitina drawida jathikayan nomaga yawamin maha parimana wadapiliwelak karagena yana bawa kolambaa thrasthawadi wimarshana anshaya saha buddhi ansha mangin karunu anawaranaya karagena thibe.ese rathu niwedana nikuth kara siti koti prabalayan thidenek malayasiyanu polisiya mangin athadanguwata gena pereda (26) rathriye meratata gena enu laba thibe.sandralingam raj mahadewan, piruba pirubakaran saha shelwathure piribanandan yana koti thidena mese athadanguwata gena thibe. 1994 warshaye koti sanwidhanayata bandi sandralingam raj mullaweli pradeshaye padinchikaruweki.
